name: Married Life With A Lamia
description:
Our Hero went hunting for treasure in the desert, eventually finding the location of an Ancient Pyramid. It was here that, fortunately - or perhaps unfortunately - through surviving the trials, he came to have the Pyramid Owner as his wife. Can our Hero resist the temptations or will he succumb to them? The choice is yours to make or maybe not.


95% of the H scenes were made by frame-by-frame drawing.

NSFW Shop system where you can unlock new scenes or features like character/text customization.

Do simple tasks to earn money.



You can challenge yourself with minigames (Avoid Traps, Labyrynth, Puzzles) for bigger rewards.

Interactions such as kissing, hugging, and headpats as well. pick your poison.

Keep tracking your relationship's progress.
